name: Stella Artois - Cannes
description:
Working with unit9, we helped to plan and execute the integration of the user's Facebook content within the video sequence.

Along with building the Flash front end, we provided tooling support via the Unwrong IDE, presenting a visual interface which the team could use to add images to the video, import tracking data from After Effects, create/edit a selection of visual filters and save their project as xml.

As a result we have a successfully executed campaign and a powerful custom tool which can be used on future similar projects.
